title: Bug 26286[Decorators] Decorators activated too soon
description: Bug 26286[Decorators] Decorators activated too soon 20021113Decorators are created as soon as they are enabledthey should only becreated first time they are applied as they not be required if thierenablement state does not pass.STEPS1) Create a workbench with no content2) Enable the binary project decoratorit will be created even though thereis nothing to decorate.
